:::The Destrocons:::

::The Destrocons are sitting around doing nothing. Skywarp and Dirge are 
drinking. Meanwhile, Ramjet is starting to think. His teammates had been 
acting awfully argumentative ever since Magmatron came back.  They were 
obviously angry that his leadership- and their high-ranking status- was cut 
short.  he could understand that.  They were Decepticons by birth and were 
bound to get power hungry, but he was born a Decepticon too, and he felt that 
leadership was not the only key to power.  But then again, there had been 
thousands of Decepticons back in the Great War, and he could safely say from 
memory that no two were alike. He wondered, How would have Starscream handled 
this?::

--part1_2f.158ee0ac.283dc025_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
